original_text: Then David arose, and all the people that were with him, and they passed over Jordan: by the morning light there lacked not one of them that was not gone over Jordan.
korean_text: 다윗이 일어나 모든 백성과 함께 요단을 건널새 새벽까지 한 사람도 요단을 건너지 못한 자가 없었더라

sentences.original_text: and all the people that were with him
there lacked not one of them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 한 사람도 빠지지 않았고

sentences.original_text: that was not gone over Jordan
